fields.headline: Names in the frame
fields.bodyText: Alan Curbishley (aged 43) Started with Hammers and now seen as one of the top young managers. Charlton have issued hands-off warning. Probability rating : 8/10 Terry Venables (58) Saviour of Boro and now heaven-sent for Hammers? The Dagenham-born supercoach would surely love a return home. Probability rating : 7/10 Kevin Keegan (50) Ready to return to club management after his England ordeal. His adventurous football and bubbly personality would suit. But limited tactically and not the man to rein in the team's free spirits. Probability rating: 5/10 George Graham (56) Available, hugely experienced and a winner, though not at Spurs. Roundhead image would not suit Hammers. Probability rating: 4/10 Stuart Pearce (39) Popular with the fans, the 39-year-old warhorse could be given another chance as player-manager after a spell in the role at Nottingham Forest. He looks a risky choice, however. Probability rating: 4/10
